messages.message:
Hello Brian, it’s been quite some time since we have spoken to each other and I’d really like to start talking to you again. I don’t know why we haven’t been friends the past few years, I don’t see any reason we shouldn’t be. Tonight I saw your mom and Chase at his graduation and I got to congratulate him and talk to your mom a little (what a great lady she is). Anyway, it got me thinking about how long it’s been since we have talked and I really can’t remember when the last time I saw you was. I wonder about how you’re doing a lot and I hope your life’s been going well. We used to be such great friends and I would really like to resurrect some semblance of what our friendship used to be. I look forward to hearing from you. 

Sincerely, Eric

Brian
Hey,
It is good to hear from you.  I don't think we stopped being friends for any one reason, I think our lives just went in separate directions.  There are going to be a couple old friends here tonight for the party, you should come by.  Feel free to bring Brianna and anyone else along, and we can all catch up!

I wish I could but we are in Flagstaff. We had to come straight back after the graduation because I had to work and Brianna has summer school. Are you still living in flagstaff or are you back in Phoenix?

Brian
I am living in Flagstaff all summer.  I am still working for the college.
Cool. I will be in Flagstaff all summer too. Hopefully that will allow us plenty of opportunities to hang out.

Hey Brian! I'm filling out a job application and I need your current address and phone number. (I have to list all people I have lived with over the past 5 years)
So just send me a message when you get a chance. I would really appreciate it.
Thank you in advance.
Also, we should hang out sometime. I'm living in Phoenix again
Hey, just wondering of you got my message from the other day?
